name: Dungo Wombo!
description:
Made for the Friday Night Game Jam 36!

WASD to move and charge combos, Spacebar to release them.

A little prototype to test out what I found to be an interesting core mechanic.

Clean up the endless horde of undead that is totally not your fault!

Credits:

Visual assets from the Kenney Micro Roguelike Pack: https://kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike

All sounds from zapsplat.com
